item.title: Towards Scalable Schema Mapping using Large Language Models
item.description: This paper was accepted and presented at MIDAS 2025. The official publication is forthcoming.

item.title: Effective Entity Augmentation By Querying External Data Sources
item.description: This paper describes the a framework for minimizing expert attention in data integration systems. It leverages online learning and empirically evaluates how models perform under this framework. This paper was accepted and presented at VLDB 2023.

item.title: Generating Data Augmentation Queries Using Large Language Models
item.description: This paper evaluates parameter efficent techniques for producing more effective data integration queries.

item.title: Lectures at the Villa of Reduced Circumstances
item.description: This graduate course presents classical results in Romance philology.

item.title: Profanity in Early Irish
item.description: This undergraduate course discusses profanity in Early Irish.
